author: newsr.in
title: Never helped Shahid Kapoor in his career, says his dad Pankaj Kapur
text: Noted actor Pankaj Kapur is proud that his actor son Shahid Kapoor has grown so much as a performer on his own efforts. Shahid, 34, made his acting debut with “Ishq Vishk” which brought him lot of accolades. He went on to deliver strong performances in films like “Jab We Met”, “Kaminey”, ” Haider” among […] »
